reviewText: One of my husband must haves. Big Pats fans.

if you are a patriots fan this is the movie for you it cheered us up when the patriots lost the superbowls

This video is a the story of the 2001 season, not the actual game.  It is narrated by Martin Sheen and the story is told by Adam Vinatieri, Tom Brady and Lawyer Milloy.  I enjoyed the video, but was hoping to see the game or highlights.  The highlights in the video are few and just punctuate the stories.  It's okay and I would recommend it to Patriot fans, but don't expect to see the game.  This video has no bonus material.
I thought I would be watching the entire game the real McCoy  not other people talking about it. I only watched a few minutes.

What a joke. I bought 4 of these dvds for my husband for x mas. We opened the first one today and was quite surprised to find out that this is not the super bowl game itself.  It's a stupid commentary from the couches and a couple players with snipers of the game. I believed thsee dvds to be the actual games. I'm very upset.  I paid $57 for 4. Who cares what people had to say about the game, we wanted to WATCH the game. What a scam.
Great dvd, with very fast delivery!
I am so glad I ordered this item.....it is an awesome DVD and brings back so many wonderful memories!!

I chose this dvd for my husbands' birthday, this NE Patriot's Superfan LOVED it. The highlights of the games to the lead-up of the Super Bowl was almost as exciting as seeing the whole season for the 1st time. & of course, that Super Bowl victory, a game that now, with this dvd, we can watch again & again. Well done!!
Must have for all Patriots fans!
